verbose_text: ATX inhibition by small inhibiting molecules like PF8380 is a rapidly evolving treatment strategy, which was used for chronic inflammation and cancer with a potential therapeutic benefit [XREF_BIBR], as well as for treating air-pouch inflammation [XREF_BIBR], collagen induced arthritis [XREF_BIBR], bleomycin induced pulmonary inflammation and fibrosis [XREF_BIBR], allergen induced asthma [XREF_BIBR], or metastasis of melanoma and breast cancer cells [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: collagen-induced arthritis [ XREF_BIBR ], bleomycin-induced pulmonary inflammation
